title: BlogDown
author: jamrizzi
description: BlogDown is a blazing fast front-end blogging platform built with Polymer. In fact, this very website is running on BlogDown.

title: Deskterm
author: jamrizzi
description: DeskTerm turns a desktop in a Gnome3 shell on Debian based Linux operating systems into a terminal.

title: NestedPop
author: jamrizzi
description: NestedPop is a promise based module that populates grandchildren for Waterline.

title: ReactGantt
author: jamrizzi
description: ReactGantt is simply a gantt chart for react.

title: Rizzi Guestbook
author: jamrizzi
description: RizziGuestbook is a WordPress plugin that creates a stunning guestbook or testimonial page, using the built in WordPress commenting system.
